typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as date 'MM-dd-yyyy',
		{Temperature (�C)} as string,
		{Minimum Temperature (�C)} as string,
		{Maximum Temperature (�C)} as string,
		{Relative Humidity (%)} as string,
		{Minimum Relative Humidity (%)} as string,
		{Maximum Relative Humidity (%)} as string,
		{Rainfall (mm)} as string,
		{Accumulated Daily Rainfall (mm)} as string,
		{ET0 (mm)} as string,
		{Accumulated ET0 (mm)} as string,
		{Atmospheric Pressure (Pa)} as string,
		{Minimum Atmospheric Pressure (Pa)} as string,
		{Maximum Atmospheric Pressure (Pa)} as string,
		{Average Wind Speed (Km/h)} as string,
		{Prevailing Wind Direction} as string,
		{Solar Radiation (W/m�)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Inicio
Inicio select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		{Rainfall (mm)},
		{ET0 (mm)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
Columnaderivada1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Modificarfila1
Seleccionar1 derive(idFecha = year(Date)*10000+month(Date)*100+dayOfMonth(Date)) ~> Columnaderivada1
Modificarfila1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idWeather as integer,
		idFecha as integer,
		Lluvia as double,
		ET0 as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.ThWeather'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		idFecha
	)) ~> sink1
